required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of ASC40 Tablets in Combination With Bevacizumab in Subjects With rGBM
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase III Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center Trial to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy pf ASC40 Tablets Combined With Bevacizumab in Subjects With Recurrent Glioblastoma

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, controlled and multi-center Phase III clinical trial to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ASC40 tablets combined with bevacizumab in the treatment of adult patients with recurrent glioblastoma. After standard radiotherapy and chemotherapy (temozolomide), the subject first experienced clinical recurrence or progression.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 6 months
primary_outcome.description: The time of progression or death from any cause in randomly grouped diseases (whichever comes first) was compared with the control group (evaluated by Independent Imaging Evaluation Committee [IRC])

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 10 months
primary_outcome.description: the time from random grouping to death, compared with the control group.

secondary_outcome.description: It is evaluated once in the 4th week after using experimental drugs (experimental drug group or control group), and then every 8 weeks until the disease progresses or dies (evaluated by [IRC]).

arm_group.description: ASC40 tablets 100mg/m^2 and bevacizumab 10mg/kg for 6 months.

intervention.description: ASC40 were taken orally once a day for 6 months.
Placebo were taken orally once a day for 6 months.
Bevacizumab once every 2 weeks, intravenous drip, for 6 months.
